thread.title: Liverpool eye Leicester winger Demarai Gray ahead of summer overhaul? Friday's transfer gossip round-up
thread.title_full: Liverpool eye Leicester winger Demarai Gray ahead of summer overhaul? Friday's transfer gossip round-up

author: Football Spy
title: Liverpool eye Leicester winger Demarai Gray ahead of summer overhaul? Friday's transfer gossip round-up
text:
Demarai Gray has become a target for Liverpool (Photo: Plumb Images/Leicester City FC via Getty) Share Get Liverpool FC   Thank you for subscribing!   
Liverpool are set to push for two new wingers this summer as Jurgen Klopp eyes a squad overhaul following a disastrous run at the turn of the year. 
Leicester speedster Demarai Gray and Bayer Leverkusen's Julian Brandt are the priorities with the German boss keen to increase his options out wide. 
Klopp attempted to bring Brandt to Anfield in January, but quickly found the Germany under-21 international's signing to be unobtainable. 
Gray, 20, has been unable to nail down a first team place since his move from Birmingham, but interests Klopp greatly and starred in the midweek win over Derby for the Foxes. 
Here is the latest news and gossip from Friday's papers: Liverpool failed in a move for Julian Brandt last month (Photo: 2016 Getty Images) Read More Adam Lallana misses Liverpool training but Jurgen Klopp expects star to be fit to face Tottenham Friday's top news and transfer stories from the Mirror
